h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff Location
content: The Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Shigandang in Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform. You will need obtain all the Buddha Eyeballs items from the Fright Cliff area to activate the fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloud-Patterned_Stone_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Shigandang in Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform. You will need obtain all the Buddha Eyeballs items from the Fright Cliff area to activate the fight.
